TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program we have a teensy problem

Articles.Content:
Dear Sir;

I am writing to you today to formally request assistance as during my recent mission to gather scientific data from Eve I encountered some difficulties. Not having a lander I decided the best course was for a low level high speed fly by. Well...umm...not accounting for the increased gravitational pull of Eve I took an ill advised EVA and was ripped from my ship.

Re entry was rather warm but amazingly my suit and pack saved me from doom. I am therefore requesting that you send a rescue mission at your earliest convenience. While I wait I shall continue to explore this purple planet.

Yours sincerely,

Jebediah Kerman

Tsc tsc...

Why im not surprised?

Thats just like you, Mr Jeb...
Things started out well....
